title: The Battle of Gettysburg, Part II (Remastered/Rebooted/Remade)
itunes:title: The Battle of Gettysburg, Part II (Remastered/Rebooted/Remade)
description: For the second installment of the "Remastered/Rebooted/Remade" Series, Codie shaves his beard, and Avery, Codie & Tony discuss the Second Day of the Battle of Gettysburg. On July 2nd, 1863, the Union Army of the Potomac & the Confederate Army of Northern Virginia clashed in one of the bloodiest single days of combat of the entire American Civil War. The guys discuss the events of the day, what the major historical takeaways are, and Codie's boyish, shaved face. Strap in for a hilarious ride with greatly improved audio compared to the original episode....oh, and Codie shaved his beard. Enjoy!

itunes:subtitle: "The Ballad of Codie's Shaved Face"
